# {{lb|fr|France|education}} oral exam at a ''[[prépa]]'' or especially during the ''[[PASS]]'' where the examinator is an older student
types.html:
sous-khôlle m (plural sous-khôlles)

  1. (France, education) oral exam at a prépa or especially during the PASS where the examinator is an older student
trans: oral exam at a prépa or especially during the PASS where the examinator is an older student
oral exam at a prépa or especially during the PASS where the examinator is an older student
